item.description: Long Beach Panorama Studio Apartment is in Long Beach Pier, one of the most popular areas of Cyprus.
item.name: Long Beach Panorama Studio Flat
item.shorttext: Long Beach Panorama Studio Apartment is in Long Beach Pier, one of the most popular areas of Cyprus.
item.content:
The general flat features of the Long Beach Panorama project are listed below.

  • White goods will be included and integrated; cooker, oven, aspirator, microwave, washing machine, dishwasher (except in studio flats)
  • Only the refrigerator will be Solo and it will be 70. 90's solo refrigerator will be used in 3+1 and 4+1 flats.
  • Wine cooler. (3+1 and 4+1)
  • 24/7 Hot water.
  • Floor coverings will be high quality ceramic or parquet.
  • Niches will be made in the walk-in shower, built-in shower mixer, rain shower in bathroom.
  • Hang closet toilets.
  • Heated towel rack will be used.
  • WC/Bathroom will have underfloor heating.
  • Silent and Humidity meter fan will be used in the WC/Bathroom.
  • All sockets will be silver and with USB ports.
  • Insect screens will be installed in each standard flat.

You can contact us for more information.

item.title: Four Seasons Life II 2+1 Flat For Sale Sea Swan
item.description: Cyprus İskele Four Seasons Life II 2+1 Flat For Sale Sea Swan |  Apartment for sale near the beach ın North Cyprus | Luxury Seafront Life Style
item.name: Four Seasons Life II 2+1 Flat For Sale Sea Swan
item.shorttext: Our New Project, Four Seasons Life II offers investors the untouched beauty of the Mediterranean in perfect harmony, with a visionary perspective that brings happiness and peace.
item.content:
Offering a life full of privileges, Four Seasons Life II offers investors the untouched beauty of the Mediterranean in perfect harmony, with a visionary perspective that brings happiness and peace. While preserving the natural structure of the region, Four Seasons Life II also emphasizes the extraordinary beauty of İskele.

A Green Living Space

The project shows how much importance it attaches to green and nature with its 61,000 m2 land area, 20,000 m2 construction area, 53,000 m2 of landscape and open areas, 15,000 m2 of green space, 20,000 root plants and trees. Four Seasons Life II consists of a total of 310 residences and 16 commercial units with the natural textures of architecture and landscape, a thoughtful eye-catching interior design, functions that can meet all your needs, and where you will find peace and happiness.

Many Social Activity Areas

Within the scope of the disabled-friendly project, an outdoor swimming pool, indoor swimming pool, aqua park, bicycle and walking paths, fitness, spa / massage – There are beauty center, tennis, basketball and volleyball courts, restaurant, café, bar, root terrace, beach bar, kids club and many other social activity areas.

Four Seasons Life II project, which has all the requirements of a quality life and all the functions of a comfortable and quality life, received a pre-request up to 30% before the launch.

item.title: Sky Sakarya 3+1 Flat For Sale
item.description: Sky Sakarya 3+1 Flat We Are Waiting For You In The Heart Of Famagusta |  Apartment for sale In North Cyprus
item.name: Sky Sakarya 3+1 Flat For Sale
item.shorttext: Located within walking distance of Sakarya Street, Citymall Shopping Mall and many businesses, one of the most popular areas of the city, "Sky Sakarya" comes to life as the last building of the trilogy in the neighboring parcel of Golden Residence and Terrace Park. In the middle of the most well-known stores, brands and accessories of Famagusta, a lively living point comes with its shops on the corner, offices and residences.
item.content:
Located within walking distance to Sakarya street, Citymall AVM and many businesses, one of the most popular areas of the city, “Sky Sakarya” It comes to life as the last building of the trilogy, on the adjacent parcel of Golden Residence and Terrace Park. Right in the middle of Famagusta's most well-known stores, brands and accessories, there is a lively living point with its corner stores, offices and residences.

Fantastic Investment Opportunity

The building, which is prepared to be an active living center that will fill its position with 11 large stores, offices, studio apartments, 1+1, 2+1 and 3+1 flats and penthouses, built on a 5000 square meter land, will consist of two blocks and terraced floors. . The project between the two main arteries of Famagusta is within walking distance of both streets and in the middle of the access roads. The project stands out as an ideal address for investment with its proximity to Ada Kent and Eastern Mediterranean University. The fact that the rent amounts in the Sakarya region are 20% higher than other regions, the annual cash payment and the increase in the value of the region provide great advantages for investors.

A New Concept for the Heart of the City Sky Sakarya

Composed of 11 shops and 139 flats in total, SKY Sakarya offers alternatives to meet all kinds of needs and flat size demands with studio, 1+1, 2+1 and 3+1 flats with large balconies and penthouse flats on terraced areas. At the same time, it creates a special option for changing working habits with the Home-Office concepts designed. The semi-enclosed mezzanine created under the high eaves in front of the shops on the ground floor will create an intermediate space in front of the shops, protected from rain and sun, and will help the commercial life to overflow here. It is already obvious that Sky Sakarya, which will rise right next to Döveç Group's award-winning projects Golden Residence and Terrace Park, will also be a candidate to win many awards.
